actions.text: Amendment SA 3753 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 3753 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 3748. To improve coordination of Federal efforts to identify and mitigate health and national security risks through a monitoring system to map essential medicine supply chains using data analytics.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3753 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3753 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To improve coordination of Federal efforts to identify and mitigate health and national security risks through a monitoring system to map essential medicine supply chains using data analytics.
